captions.text: Hi I'm Sung Joo, the leader and the lead vocal of the team
My best feature is my shoulders
I'm in charge of vocals and looking good
I'm tall, I have long legs and a big heart
I'm Yi Bo, the rapper and dancer of the team
My special talent is freestyle dancing
I'm Seung Youn, in charge of rap and vocal in UNIQ
Our title song "Falling In Love" is about
the purity and excitement of first love
We'll teach you what guys do when they fall in love
Step 1. In front of her, heart drops and breathing stops
Hey Wen Han, what do guys do when they're in love?
For me, I don't really show it
I've got you in right here
Oh gosh, what's wrong with you?
When guys are in front of girls they like
their hearts drop and heads blank out
Gather the love in your left hand
Pick up the heart you dropped
Step 2. Appealing with a signature scent
Hey Yi Bo... hang on a second
Yi Bo, how can I appeal to the girl I like?
Well, I kept giving candies to the girl I like
Will that make her think about me or no?
Why isn't he giving me candies today?
I'd rather sing her a sweet love song
Oh bro, that's not cool at all
Do you want to try some?
Spray perfume on your left wrist
Then dab around your upper body
Spray some more on the wrist
and dab around your neck again
Spread them out then back together again
Step 3. If you can feel her eyes, shout!
Yi Bo, give me the eyes of a guy in love
Alright since we did the Heart Drop and the Perfume dances
Her heart will start to bounce, bounce
Show us how that will make you feel
Nice! Can I tell her how I feel now?
If you can feel her eyes in love!
Let's learn step 3, the Roar Dance!
Touch the ground and take a short break
Then stretch with a big smile!
Thank you, thank you, bow twice
Then pump and pump in excitement
Thank you, thank you, bow twice again,
Then stretch out your entire body

title: Let's Dance: UNIQ(유니크) _ Falling In Love [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]
